venue.address_2: Opposite Sears entrance at Galleria Ma
venue.name: VFW

item.description:
Live Music, Singles Networking, Cheap Drinks, Pool Table Party

Party with Free Live Music in East Cambridge near the Galleria Mall. The venue has very cheap drinks, a relaxed atmosphere, pool table, and free live music of great musicians and an open mike. This event is linked with 4 other meetups! Here is the ad -

Attention Party goers, Musicians, Singles & Singers!! Come join the party at the Wed Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge - Play pool, socialize wth interesting people & musicians, song or play music solo or with backing band. All instruments and styles welcome. Temptations style group singing is encouraged! Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band and Songlist for singers.

Crystal Bar VFW across from the Sears Entrance of the Galleria Mall near Lechmere. 59 1st St., Cambridge. Weekly open mike Wednesday night - starts at 7PM. Bring your friends for the party, network, play pool, and meet, interesting people & singles. Inexpensive drinks (bottle beer $2.75 import $3.75 wine $3!!!!).
item.name: Free Party - Live Music, Networking, Cheap Drinks, Pool Table
